alert.note: Alert for Inyo; San Bernardino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 21 at 1:13AM PDT until August 21 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... South Central Inyo County in south central California... Western San Bernardino County in southern California... * Until 500 AM PDT. * At 113 AM PDT, California Highway Patrol reported rock and debris blocking State Route 62 in Yucca Valley. Flash flooding is ongoing in parts of southern San Bernardino County and northwest San Bernardino County. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of washes, low-water crossings and low- lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... SR62 in Morongo Valley and Yucca Valley. SR247 in Johnson Valley. US395 in western San Bernardino County. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
